p: Anti-inflammatory activity shown by 2 diterpenes suaveolol, and methyl suaveolate against croton oil induced dermatitis of mouse ear. It induced dose-dependent edema inhibition [ 86]. The pentacyclic triterpenoid ursolic acid produces profound and effective anti-inflammatory effects [ 51]. The anti-inflammatory effect of H. suaveolens by scavenging free radicals similar to standard anti-inflammatory drug Ibuprofen was reported by several authors [ 52, 87].
